content: vintage rabbit vintage rabbit has a classic look reminiscent of the velveteen rabbit he stands 15 tall the perfect size for a child s best friend or your own knitting companion the original version of this pattern is from patons knits circa 1940 s here it is with my own modifications materials abbreviations yarn cascade 220 heathers or any worsted weight co cast on st stitch brown - ½ skein or about 100-130 yards k knit p purl white about 30-50 yards k2tog knit two stitches together needles size us 4 p2tog purl two stitches together stuffing sl1 slip one stitch purl-wise two small buttons for eyes ssk slip 2 sts purl-wise place back on left needle whiskers can be made of anything and knit both of them decrease through back loop canvas or stiff fabric to line ears psso pass the slipped stitch over pink embroidery thread for nose kfb knit in the front and back of stitch seed stitch row 1 *k1 p1* to end row 2 *p1 k1* to end note the seed stitch can seem tricky when you re increasing or decreasing stitches don t worry too much about which stitch comes next knit or purl -- do whatever is the opposite of the stitch below it won t matter if the edges don t follow the *k1 p1* pattern exactly since they will be seemed to another piece outer leg and lower body inner legs and belly with brown yarn co 40 sts with white yarn co 60 sts row 1-10 seed stitch row 1 wrong side purl all stitches row 11 cast off 12 sts for leg seed stitch to end row 2 right side k28 k2tog ssk k28 row 12 seed stitch row 3 purl all stitches row 13 k2tog seed stitch to end row 4 k27 k2tog ssk k27 row 14 seed stitch row 5 purl all stitches repeat row 13 and 14 until 25 sts remain continue in this manner decreasing 2 sts at center work seed stitch for 2 straight ending after a of every right side row and purling all stitches on plain seed stitch row every wrong side row until 50 sts remain next row cast off 12 sts for leg purl to end back next row cast off 12 sts for the other leg k to next row seed stitch until 2 sts before end ssk end 26 sts remain next 3 row seed stitch next row p2tog purl to last 2 sts sl1 p1 psso repeat the last 4 row until 18 sts remain next row k10 k2tog ssk k10 next row seed stitch until 2 sts before end ssk next row p2tog purl to last 2 sts sl1 p1 psso next row seed stitch next row knit all stitches repeat last 2 row until 13 sts remain on needle next row p2tog purl to last 2 sts sl1 p1 psso next row k7 k2tog ssk k7 16 sts remain head work in straight stockinette stitch
